content=To Ciping after not to be the Jinggangshan revolutionary museum. The museum was founded in 1959, the museum by Marshal Zhu De personally by building simple, solemn, has distinct national style.

Jinggangshan famous dishes are heavily the emperor, Yongxin dog, home fried blood duck, glass fish, fried partridge, the orange wire etc.
